name: John addams
coverLetter: Im a local, living in mckinleyville.  Ive been in humboldt for twenty years and involved with the industry for over 15 years.  Im mature, easy going, on time and responsible.  I have my own vehicle, local references for 215 work and non 215 work and im available 7 days a week.  Im seeking to connect with a steady, responsible crew of like minded intelligent adults to accomplish various tasks in a professional and efficient manner while maintaining a solid quality of finished product.  I have lots of trimming and other work experience; on a given day I usually produce 1.5 to 2 lbs of manicured product.  Im interested in steady work all year round.  Thanks for reading
